content.detailedDescription: I was waiting at a stop light as i noticed three strange lights over head. i pulled over in a parking lot to stop and observe and take photos. as i was watching the three craft hovering two of them started moving straight up and away from me their lights getting smaller and smaller as they flew out of my sight. the third stage where it was except for moving erratically from side to side after around 5 minutes it took off in the same direction as the other two and quickly shot straight up pverhead the same direction as the others.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 round objects rut hovering overhead, 2 of the round crafts took off straight up over my head until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Standing on the beach in edmonds taking random pictures of the sunset facing west across puget sound. didn't know it was there until i saw the photos. it appeared in one photo and then it was gone in the next one.
content.summary: Watching sunset took photo.

content.detailedDescription: My husband called me outside looked up, on 900 block of elm ridge avenue in arbutus maryland; saw 3 ufos in a crooked line formation, first two, then a third appeared.  all orange lights, each craft looked like an orange circle light in the middle and five to six circle lights around each. a dodecahedron/geometric flower shape is the closest i can find to describe shapes. they stayed bright , glowing for 2 to 3 minutes and then disappeared, north sky, at 10 minutes to midnite 12/31/2015. t first i was not scared, but then ,since it felt and looked so close to us, like closer than an airplane in the sky; i started to get anxious that maybe it would zoom in on us, so i was just about to run inside when they disappeared. i still ran inside and looked on the internet to see if anyone else reported it.
content.summary: 3 dodecahedron/geometric flower shape ufos in a staggard line formation bright orange, still for 2 to 3 minutes then disappeared; between utility lines and sky.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were travelling north on highway 50 between benson and mcgee's crossroads. it was very foggy that night, enough to obscure sight of clouds and most stars. the light/orb appeared streaking north/northwest, blinked out and back, then it disappeared above the tree line ahead. my wife and i both asked excitedly "did you see that?" at the same time. we tried to rationalize what it could be, saying that it was too slow to be a "shooting star" and too fast to be a plane/helicopter/drone at that distance. also the fact that it was a bluish color light and tail that was left. the tail was only visible for a few seconds.
content.summary: Blue light orb appeared suddenly, moving downward, blinked and disappeared. it left a blue tail that lasted only seconds.

content.detailedDescription: I am at work in chillicothe no, when i stepped outside to have a ciggerete, i noticed a very bright light in the sky, at first i thought it was a star but the more i looked at it the less sure i was as i could not vissably see any other stars in the sky. the phenomenon seemed to glad very quickly between many different colors no discernible pattern. it remained stationary over an hour. i did not keep it under constant survallence as i was working but i would h back outside at regular intervals to see if the object was still present. i could observe 2 smaller lights with it one directly below it and on below and to the right of the phenomenon, i recorded cell phone video footage of the phenomenon, though the 2 smaller lights were not visible on the phones camera only to the naked eye.
content.summary: Pulsating light in sky

content.detailedDescription: while on the phone w my daughter wishing her a happy new year,i was outside in front of the house watching fireworks.Looking up to the west i noticed what i thought was an ignited firework but it never exploded?? instead the bright red light slowly traveled to east. whatever this object was stayed under the thick clouds. solid bright red light was visible for close to 2and a half minutes. during that time i had to run to the back yard but this strange light changed direction south and then it was gone. hidden by the clouds and gone in the distance.I dont know what i saw but it was unlike anything ive ever seen. initial reaction was anger bc during this encounter i was steady yelling for my boyfriend and he didnt finally come outside until it was gone....
content.summary: Observed what i thouwasanght was an ignited firework in the sky.It didn't explode but slowly traveled from west to east then south.

content.detailedDescription:
At about 1:10 am i was looking in the west sky from santa ana,i see a reddish orange ball of light moving towards the east then stoped and three more reddish orbs seem to fall out of it.The three orbs almost immediately vanished while the one i first seen shot back to the west and vanished.(it drew my attention because it was an 
abnormal color for the planes you get over head here)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Orangish - red ball objecting tree more red orange balls

content.detailedDescription: I  photographed something by accident i think.
content.summary: Came down through clouds and then back up. have photo.

content.detailedDescription: Just like i said ,my brother and i thought we saw what's looks to be a  ufo
content.summary: We came out hearing fireworks , thought we saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
As i was walking home from the news year eve party, at about 12:11am i heard in the background fireworks going off, i saw an orange red light rise up into the sky from the n.E. of my route home and thought it was a fire works but it didn't go off or fall, it started flying level towards me.  high up but level.  it stopped and hovered and then rose up into the night sky.  i shielded my eyes from the street light and watched it go blurry then seem to shift shape to that of a saucer shape after the light went off.  i then followed it as it flew right over top of me totally silent just a dull silver disc shape very fast, it was clearly disk saucer shaped and just visible.  watched it until i couldn't see it as it flew away to the south east.  

i then kept walking home, north on cranston road, after crossing cranston dr. i then noticed a second similar silver craft with a similar orange red light flying se a bit further to the east of my position.  this was about 1 minute later.  the second craft was further away from me going about the same speed and had red sparks flashing out of the back of the craft.  i thought it was fireworks again but it just kept flying away disappearing behind the condo complex.  also to the south east.

i then turned north and continued to walk home and as i turned west on my street as i crossed cranston road i saw the third orange red light it was quite a ways further north travelling level from the west to the east.  as i walked past a house i lost sight of it.  

i'm a tea totaller, i only drank five iced teas at the party.
content.summary: 3 orange red lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was out removing my rear tail light covers to repair them, when i noticed a bright orange orb in the sky to the east. i started watching it and two more orange orbs appeared in a triangular formation heading at 285 to 310 nw. as the floated to the nw for a min or two the last two orbs that appeared blinked out one at a time a few seconds apart. the first one continued to the nw then it blinked out a minute later, then another orange sphere appeared to the east at an horizon angle of about 14 degrees heading to the ne at a heading of 088 to 089. it 

the video accompanying is of very low quality, it was captured with my phone. i did get one of the orb on but like i say its very bad. i mostly uploaded it for the audio of my observations.
content.summary: Triangular formation or orange orbs

content.detailedDescription:
i had just pulled in my driveway a couple of minutes to midnight & was talking on my cell phone when i noticed a bright orange light to the ne at approximately 15 degrees elevation.  (friend on phone was counting down last 30 seconds of 2015, so time should be exact within seconds)
    light was orange & brighter than venus at it's brightest.  it appeared round, and i'd estimate it's angular size 4 to 6 minutes of angle.  
    figuring orange was a strange color for aircraft lights, i looked carefully for wing lights or strobe and could see neither.  (from it's course, i should have been able to see a red wing light and the strobe.)  
     i got excited & told my friend to stop counting down & look to the east--also hollered at neighbors to look, yelling & pointing; but it was midnight on new years eve and i don't think anyone was paying attention.
     aircraft, object, light, or whatever  appeared to move in a straight line at constant elevation from ne to nnw and was in sight for i'd guess a minute or so before it disappeared behind trees. 
     this was the 3rd time in the past 10 or 12 years i've seen a similar orange light over the cape...The first 2 appeared stationary.  

     (the obvious question, it being new year's eve is: "was i drinking?"  i'd had one jello shot an hour or so prior to driving home--that was it.)  

      while i haven't flown myself for 10 or 15 years, i have several years experience as a trained air observer, but i'd prefer not to be identified publicly.  the folks i work for take a dim view of on-duty ufo reports...I imagine they'd take an even dimmer view of me filing an off-duty report with anyone else.  if you can't identify this thing by time & place, i'd be happy to talk privately with an investigator--your chief investigator knows me & can set it up.  sorry i didn't get any photos, but i'm pretty good with sketches, diagrams, maps & charts.
content.summary: Bright orange light spotted over indian river lagoon near kennedy space center moving from ne to nnw

content.detailedDescription:
These sighting all took place from our 4th floor balcony on riverside ave overlooking downtown and most of san marco. at around 10pm est, we noticed three bright red/orange orbs fly just over san marco from south to north, following the river. the objects flew by one by one on the exact same path and altitude about 1 minute apart for each orb. they disappeared at the same exact spot, right directly in front of us. the objects appeared to be probably about 1000-1500 feet msl and varied their speed and path with each one following the same path each time. these orbs originated from behind our vantage point from around the lakewood area and followed the south bank or the st. john's river. 

fast forward to just after the midnight new years eve fireworks downtown, we saw the same three red/orange orbs pop up in san marco, around the public school building area. they were about a minute apart. the first one flew up and over the river to the north, then hovered, then descended, then hovered and then flew back towards the south and then started to ascend again and then slowly moved back towards the north while ascending then the orb appeared to move towards the east and put towards the arlington area (which is confirmed by another sighting that was reported on mufon by a couple in arlington). then as the first odd was making its was up and towards the east, another one appeared from the same area in san marco and did almost the same thing, but didn't change directions as much and slowly rose up to the northeast and then to the east towards arlington. at about this time, the first orb disappears in the sky. then, about a minute later, a third orb appeared in the sky and followed almost the same path. at about this point, the second orb disappeared way up in the sky to the east. the third orb eventually disappeared toward the east just as the other orbs had. then, about 15 minutes later, a fourth orb suddenly appears over san marco and changed directions a few times and hovered, got really bright then dim and broth again and quickly rose up in altitude and flew north east while ascending in altitude before slowly disappearing. this last orb flew very very high before disappearing into the night, higher than the other orbs. 

these orbs have been seen in the same area several nights before as well. two night ago, we saw a red/orange orb hover over the main street bridge area for several minutes. the orb flew very fast from side to side up and down but was perfectly controlled and was very fast. at one point, the orb flew in front of the main street bridge so i could tell it was between my vantage point and the bridge. it stayed in the area for about 10 minutes and then disappeared.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 4 red/orange orbs flew over downtown jacksonville on new years eve.

content.detailedDescription:
I was on the telephone with my brother who was telling me that he saw a strange light in a nearby town to the north of where i live. he looked away for a second and it was gone. after i hung up with him i was telling on of my sons about what my brother had just told me.  my other son went outside to get something from his car and he yelled out for me to come outside.  my other son and i ran outside to see what was happening, he was facing east, towards the mountains and when we looked we couldn't believe what we were seeing.  there were about five glowing lights in a large spread out v formation.  i ran inside to get my husband and daughter and her boyfriend and my sons girlfriend.  we all witnessed the lights. 7 of us. my daughter tried to record them but they were not showing up on her phone. 
when i went back out side there were only 3 lights and one by one they dimmed and disappeared.  every one else came inside. i, my daughter and her boyfriend sat outside for and hour and a half and we saw one of the same lights come back and the disappear.  we saw it for about 3 minutes. we still waited and looked but didn't see anything any more.  i did notice 2 airplanes in the far distance in the same area of the lights flying in a circle there.  i texted a friend and she told me that her brother also saw the lights. it was scary and exciting.  
what was it?  where did they go? what are they doing? i have lived in this spot for 10 years.  we have seen things here and there but nothing like that. i would love to know what we were seeing.
content.summary: Reddish orange glowing lights to the east in a v formation

content.detailedDescription: 2nd sighting in less then a week, this time from our front yard ,1 minute after midnight , watched 4 orbs take off and fly away,
content.summary: Wife and in saw 4 orbs rise above tree line , and travel from left to right while climbing

content.detailedDescription: Three lights red in color traveling slowly i believe south to north. completely silent no sound of aircraft engines or helicopter rotors heard. about 15 after midnight.
content.summary: Three glowing small lights first in triangle pattern with no sound

content.detailedDescription: This object moved at first low on the horizine and very speratice.I decided to get my phone and try to record it and take pictues. i was very surprised that the object would actualy appear on the screen.Nothing else in the night sky such as stars and planes will appear at night on my phone.We first recorded a short motion picture which did not turn out to good because of position and flashing and dissapear and reappeare movement.Then it became steady enough to take pictures of.It seemed to want us to see it better and moved and hoverd in a way that made it possable.This is when i felt that it knew i was watching it.I lost all sense of time.Before i knew it,it was daylight and i was still outside watching and taking pictures.Instead of looking almost straight ahead i had to look in the 1:00 and2:00 oclock possition.This is when i saw three balls of entense light almost behind me.When i turned my attencion back to the object i got a clear message to go inside and done so quickly.It later seemed very strange that i would go inside when it was still vissable.I have not been able to complete a report till now.I need to share this to all who want to see and know what i saw.I have photos that need to be seen and i do not know how to send them. i truly hope that this is taken seriously as i have them on my cellphone to share.
content.summary: My wife and i were at home watching the news and heard that there would be a meteor shower that night. we went outside to look.The night sky was fair and clear.We saw a few planes and a couple of small shooting stars.Then i saw a strang moving object that

content.detailedDescription: I was in the back yard walking my dog and we both spotted a very bright light coming up from the west, and fast! he (my dog) looked at me and i looked at him and i said "check it out it looks like aliens!" so when it was almost overhead i said loudly "what's the big deal why don't you come down and say hello?" and it stopped and kind of looked at us! then moved on straight south. i should say there was no noise and no required faa lights. well for the new year i am going to take my iphone with me everywhere!
content.summary: Came up from the west kind of stopped  overhead then headed south.

content.detailedDescription: We saw them and they looked like fires at first glance but then they flew up at high speeds staying close to the forest. flew up and over mountain top and off in to the sky one set was 3 in a chevron formation becoming straight line formation heading to the east. once they were clear of the mountain they became dimm very quickly. object was glowing fireball orange with some red flares. feelings were quick to rationalize as fireworks but lasted for minutes. most were travel in a straight line but a few took quick turns then straight lines. digital camera would not pick up the light. distortion on camera when i zoomed. 2130 to 2140 mountain time. photos attached but probably nothing to see in them
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Glowing orbs looked like fire then flew out of forest up and over mountain dimming after rise above mountain

content.detailedDescription:
My man and i were enjoying our back patio this new years eve 2015 in jacksonville, florida when we noticed a bright pulsating orange light coming into sight over the treetops. it was coming from the west and were in the arlington area so they came from downtown's direction. a few seconds after the first one came into sight another one appeared in the same manner. a few seconds later a third followed suit. all three were flying in a straight line heading east towards the beach. about a minute later all three were no longer in sight, they seemingly disappeared into the night. that's when a fourth object appeared coming from the same direction as the others. it flew on it's own, pulsating orange just the same. about a minute or less later it too had disappeared into the night.

in the group of the first three objects, the second one would flash orange but we could also see red every once in awhile. all of the lights had a steady pulse but they didn't seem to be in sync with one another.

we were kind of excited. i'm not sure what to believe. i've always been curious about extraterrestrial life and i believe life exists outside of our planet in some way, shape, or form. i'm also an atheist so i'm a huge skeptic about certain aspects of it also.
content.summary: 3 bright pulsating orange lights, flying in straight line from w to e, one light trailing about 1 minute behind others. they all seemingly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were taking our dog for a walk, heading east on chesham drive; when we turned onto the next side street, i noticed an object in the sky that appeared to be out of control. it was changing colors fast and moving erratically in the night sky. my wife, kathy, suggested we go back to the house and get the binoculars and video cam.  we came back and got the equipment and went back to the same spot and started the camera. i took probably 15 to 20 minutes of video and several pictures. 

the object would move violently from side to side,up and down and move closer than farther away. i could not tell you the size or the speed but it was very fast and very hard to stay in focus.

we were very curious and very excited to finally see a ufo.
content.summary: It would change directions constantly; like side to side,in and out

content.detailedDescription: I was walking, it was about 10pm. i noticed a pyramid shaped vessel hovering just above the trees in the valley, it had rows of white lighted windows. i decided to get a better look at it so i walked to a curve in the road that was open and had few trees. as i reached the curve there was a man shaped vessel . it had a head it had arms and legs, the torso was shaped like an oil drum. the arms were gripping branches of the tree, the head had an open mouth, i could see inside of it, there were 3 small figures the light of the interior illuminated their bodies and faces.(yellow)there were circular ladders that surrounded the inside of the head structure. the figures were using a manipulator to grab limbs. they pulled them inside the vessels head, i could hear the branches breaking and snapping, the figures were harvesting the buds that were just emerging. it was a maple tree a norway maple. there was the smell of fish ether. i had a prior encounter two months earlier so i wanted a chance to understand the technology of the vehicle(s). so i stood there on the road looking intently at this harvester for at least 5 minutes, they stripped the upper limb tips in that short time. the vessel slowly floated away as if on the breeze sounds came from the interior from the figures and their tools, but the vessel made no sound at, it was silent. i couldn't follow because of mountain terrain, i was so elated by this encounter i was astonished by the human like structure of the vehicle, its arms were very mechanical and looked much like steel tubes with hydraulic lines and rams attached to them. there were green lights flying around the valley one of them was easy to follow after, it was over a cow field. i entered the field to follow the green light. it quickly disappeared into the woods at the top of the field. i looked up there was moonlight, i noticed two small vessels that were balloon like structures they seemed to be made of cloth. they were illuminated from within, they floated on helium i think, they were moving against the wind, they followed me for 15 minutes as i walked up the hill to the edge of the woods . one of the balloons looked like a stingray it was shaped and colored to mimic a stingray. they floated overhead and disappeared over the hill that i was climbing. i was attempting to retro engineer what i was seeing. these encounters lasted just over an hour. i returned home excited about seeing the figures with their elongated skulls. the obvious display of mechanical structure intrigued me deeply to get even closer. after making it home i made some drawings of the harvester to try and figure out how it worked. i went to bed for the night. in my sleep i was awakened by a grey. his big eyed environment suit was off. he was about 4 feet tall, he had gold colored eyes, the same size as our eyes, at once he said blue streak and pointed, i saw the blue streak, it was a proton or something, in the air, it lit up then went out . the grey gave me a tour of the vessel they were in. the fuel cells they use look like blackberries, they are power balls, also known as a screaming weenie, the machine that filled them looks like an octopus or a squid, the tentacles are suction cup check valves. when filled the fuel cells move around on their own with the force of fluid tension. he took me to a place in the vessel where there is little gravity, there, the mantis men do their work. they taught me how to build a runaway magnet motor that generates electricity. it is a ball and socket  arrangement or magnets with the opposing poles forced together. the ball inside of the socket housing spun ay screaming speeds, a contactor touched the ball sparks were present at the contact point, the grey said white streak, and we all saw the white streak, without their spacesuits they look just like us but have elongated skulls and a greyish color to the skin, they have no head hair. we shared a volley of puns and an idiom. it was a lesson in the path of the prophet. they allowed me to watch a sodium peroxide thruster test. this is when i realized that the vessel i was on was huge, over one mile wide and thousands of feet tall, after the test i have a lapse of memory , i just remember sitting up in bed, with the vivid recognition of what had just occurred. i made drawings of these things at that moment. the magnet motor had gyro.Flywheels inside of it to sustain or help sustain magnetic flip, i have spent many hours trying to design one based on what i learned about theirs. after this occurrence, i managed to make progress on something important i managed to crack the bible code, this led to an increase in my understanding of everything,
content.summary: The arms held onto limbs of the tree the head structure had an open mouth, branches were pulled into the vessel then released

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i had just returned on a commercial flight following christmas in florida with our children and their families.  we departed seatac airport for home which is about 100 miles away near leavenworth, wa.  we needed gas so we stopped at about 8:00 pm in woodinville, wa just off of hwy 522.  while i was getting gas and my wife was in the car i noticed three orange orbs/lights moving from north to south and approximately over hwy 522. i think the movement of the lights is what drew my attention to them.  at first i thought they were airliners lined up on final for landing at seatac airport which is about 25 miles to the south of our location.  i also considered the idea they were flares launched from military aircraft but realized the military, navy, wouldn't do that over populated areas.  furthermore, there is no military training areas there due to commercial air traffic.  i looked closely at the lights as they drew near me and saw the lights were definitely orange with no hint of the lights being aircraft position lights.  the fact that the lights faded away and didn't continue in a straight line towards seatac airport also convinced me they weren't aircraft.  there was no clouds or fog in the area obscuring my view of the lights at any time. they were maybe 2000 agl and flying slow as the video shows.  the orbs moved behind a leafless tree that was near my location which caused them to disappear momentarily as a branch blocked the view.  when they were in the area where the tree blocked the view of the lights they would individually fade away leaving a black night sky. two of the lights turned to the west before they faded away.  the sky was clear and stars were visible.  all total we saw six orbs but could only see three at a time as the trailing orbs were below the horizon.  about the time the lead orb would fade away a third trailing orb would come into view.  the video concludes when all the orbs have faded away.  in the video you hear my wife talk about the tree and that she thought they were aircraft.  you can hear me talking and saying they aren't aircraft as aircraft position lights are red or green with white strobes or flashing beacons.  i'm a retired commercial pilot as of only a year ago although i still fly privately.  my wife has since changed her opinion as to them being aircraft and now feels they are ufo's of some sort.  i knew i was looking at something strange that night and thought they were ufo's.  i've heard people talk about lights like this on the coast to coast radio show hosted by george noory. since my wife listens to the radio show with me when we are driving she wasn't shocked but found the lights interesting, especially the fact the lights were equally spaced apart and disappeared into thin air.  in my 36 years plus working as a pilot i've never seen a ufo or strange lights like the ones i saw last night.  of note:  when i first started refueling a saw a helicopter about 1/2 east of me.  when we finished filming the orange orbs i pointed out to my wife a helicopter about 3/4 miles east of us and his red/green position lights.
content.summary: Saw about six orbs flying in a straight line, equally distant apart and all of them faded away individually/sequentially.

content.detailedDescription:
The date was 01/01/16, but your menu doesn't list 2016 so i put 31/12/15.

it was a minute or two past midnight on 1st jan 2016.  fireworks were going off all around as the new year started.  my mum went running out into the garden, i asked her what she was doing and she said she'd seen an orange light stationary in the sky from the bedroom windown upstairs, but now it was gone.

as we stood in the garden my mum noticed another orange light.  she said "there, it was just like that one!" she pointed and we watched as this bright, pulsating orange craft moved silently accross the sky.  it was clearly not a plane, it appeared larger and the entire thing glowed and pulsated orange.  

i couldn't make out the exact shape of the craft as it was pulsating from orange to almost black, but it appeared roughly triangular.  the pulsing orange appeared around the craft in wavy stripes, like ripples in water.  it pulsed slightly faster than once a second and moved silently, smoothly and swiftly across the sky.  it moved west to east straight towards the moon before flickering and fading out.  there were no clouds in the sky, it was clear and cold and you could see every star, but it dissapeared completely as it neared the moon.

we both agreed immediately that it was extra terrestrial.  we don't own anything that large, that fast, that pulses orange in wavy shimmers and has the ability to dissapear.
content.summary: Pulsating bright orange craft moving east toward the moon at midnight new years day

content.detailedDescription: We were coming back from shooting fireworks at ghost dam. it was late, after midnight. i sat in the back seat and noticed a bright star on the horizon. i watched it and noticed that it stayed in the same relative position, even when we turned a corner. i pointed this out to my friends and we all started to watch the star. after a while, it started to move lower and came closer. we panicked and the driver hit the gas. i felt strange and a light came into the car. i looked up through the back window and saw a bright white light that looked like the moon, only very close and brighter. it stayed over the car. that's when the driver said, "i'm not driving" and let go of the steering wheel. the car kept moving and stayed on the road. we just kept driving until we got to cochrane. as we got to the first intersection at the edge of town, it felt safe and we drove through and up the long hill that heads to calgary, or so we thought. at the top of the hill, the car stopped as if it hadn't been moving at all and there was a bright orange light sitting right in the middle of the road. i can't say why, but we all got out of the car and started to walk toward the light. it was quiet and i remember a feeling to the air, like a crackle with no sound. about half way to the light, i said, "it's just a truck parked at the side of the road." we looked at a truck sitting silently with it's headlights on, parked at the left side of the road and we all turned around without another word. we got into the car and drove to calgary. that's the last i ever saw those guys and i have only told this story a few times. if i am contacted, there is more.
content.summary: Saw ufo as star. it came closer and hovered over the car. eventually stopped on road in front of us.

content.detailedDescription:
I saw two orbs moving in front of me, towards me quickly, but there were fireflies out so i assumed it to be larger fireflies. they got closer moving fast and it sounded like a high pitched "wee!" as if they were enjoying riding their flame things...

i was sitting in the window of my truck, i had been playing a seti app minutes before and was being eaten by mosquitoes so opted a seat on the window instead of the tailgate. i had a perfect view of these things coming in, as if they were doing it on purpose. i froze wanting to get either in or out of my truck. it was happening so fast i knew i didn't have time to decide, whatever was going to happen was going to happen. 

as they were nearly inline with me now as i sat on the window still, they were out the drivers window close to me, it felt like time slowed down. i saw the one closest to me turn his head and look at me. they were so small. they looked the same color as a fire ember. i was so confused. they rode something but it too looked like it was engulfed in fire. it had dark eyes, like empty, like the night was shining thru the back. it had a cheshire cat grin. with sharp long teeth. it was a bit like the mouth off the movie "critters."  i had the thought run through my mind that it could have devoured me and not left a bone so i was glad it seemed happy. 

it passed by me and i followed it, watching closely for it to hit the ground running. still unsure how to react. but as it came within inches of the field road, it was like both of them disappeared. i stumbled out of the window and exited the truck. i looked for any light or sign they were there or had been there, and there was nothing. i could hear the shrill noise in my head yet, it was as if i expected them to come over to me. i even called out to see if they'd do anything. 

i saw no ships. no anything normal to describe. i'm at a loss for words to even describe what i did see. i don't even know what to call them. i have nicknamed them my fairies. but only cuz of the size. i have no idea what else to call them.
content.summary: I saw two orbs moving in front of me, towards me quickly, but there were fireflies out so i assumed it to be larger fireflies. they got closer moving fast and it sounded like a high pitched "wee!" as if they were enjoying riding their flame things...

content.detailedDescription:
This sighting was in the late fall early winter of 1974 i believe. i would have been 11 years old at the time , i am know 52, 3 friends and i were playing hockey on a homemade rink in our friends backyard. it was a cold and clear, crisp evening. it was quite dark as well. the rink was located directly behind my backyard. as kids at the time we were skating and playing on the small rink when one of my closest friends had said, hey whats that? we looked to the direction he was pointing and it was toward mount mckay which is approximately a 1,000 ft plus ancient shale mountain that is visible throughout the city. we lived only about 3 or so miles from it so the view was excellent.So what we all witnessed was bright deep red rectangular lights going around an oval pattern, fairly rapidly in sequence. when the lights went around the back they would disappear briefly and reappear on the front view able area again. the shape the lights went around on and off in sequence was oval disc like. we could not see the object, just the lights encircling it, in what appeared to be in the center circumference of it.As kids of that age we did not know what it was or even think of the word ufo.We did not know anything about that stuff back then. the lights appeared digital and very precise in speed. this object was positioned on the left of the mountain which seemed to cover approx 1/3 of the mountain top. mt. mckay was quite untouched and still is to this day mostly.It sits on indian land and it has maple syrup trees, and a small ski area which is not at this location of the sighting. some people used to say that it is skiers torches but that is not the situation here  this was something large ,and appeared intelligently controlled, since we did not have that type of technology then, especially that big.

the other thing that is interesting is that area had the city's drinking water supply from loch lommand which in the 70's was considered to be one of the best drinking waters of its time.Whether that is relevant or not is unknown. so while we watched these lights going around the object my friends gave up and started playing hockey again. i remained in the middle of the ice still staring at this thing in amazement. my friends told me to move or start playing which i did. i then looked up again less that 2-3 minutes later and it was gone. we did not see it leave. the next day there were supposed reports to the radio station and so on from numerous people. we talked about it at school the next day.Apparently some witnesses seen the object take off rapidly into the night sky. nothing ever became of what we saw, or at least as far as i know.

 i never thought about it at all for many years until one evening in my early 30's there was a show on tv called town meeting from seattle. they were talking about ufo sightings. a person on the show reported seeing a craft with red sequential lights very similar to what we saw in the mid 70's as well. after watching that it brought me right back to that evening where we saw what we did.

 to this day i have almost been haunted by it when i think about it and wish i would have watched it until it took off. i went back to my hometown 8 years ago and went to the library with my son to try and locate a newspaper clipping about the sighting. i spent around 2 hours and gave up due to time constraint which was disappointing that i could not locate anything. i still believe there is a record of it there or somewhere. i have told many people about this experience since, and stood at the base of the mountain from a distance and got big goosebumps.It is still to this day quite haunting , the thought of who and what it was we saw, which i know was a large disc shaped object.

 this is an absolutely true event which i have shared with stanton friedman by writing to him and now mufon which i should have a lot sooner! i want to ask if this type of craft with these similar lights have been reported to mufon especially from the 70's around mid north america?

 to this day since i have been an avid ufo buff and have seen most shows from back to sightings that was on fox i believe all the way to mostly everything to date they have aired in my area to date since the 90's. i rarely hear or see any stories reporting the red sequential lights we saw though, which i find odd.

 i have had 3 more different sightings since that time 2 orbs,a black triangle, and something high up like a satellite but upon further observation i watched it change direction and proceed in an opposite direction. it is mainly due to my dedication to amateur astronomy & stargazing with high powered binoculars i have had for many years.
 
thanks for allowing me to share my experience.I hope the picture of the mountain turns out adequate.If not i retrieved it from the net.
content.summary: Large landed craft on top of local mountain far left corner approx 1/3 area of mountain top

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my house around midnight to visit with a neighbor across the street on the corner.  all of a sudden with no noise an unidenif. ufo swooped down above me.  it stayed over me for some time and light up everything to where i could see the fence, flowers, cars and stairs going up to my neighbors house.  i could not yell, and just felt frozen.  then my friend came out because of all the light, and ran down the stairs to me.  we just watched in awe.  then it began to teeter very slowly up over her roof top and stayed a few mins more and again teetered slowly and just swooped off very very fast and looked like a mist or vaper left behind as it was leaving.  we then went into the house and called the us air base closet to los banos, ca. and five unmarked cars showed up within the hour.  they took me in the house and asked questions with a very large recorder.  then they took me outside where the air force men had telescopes set up and werelooking at the sky.  they let me look, and we saw a few of the ufo's playing tag with each other.  they looked like stars, but were not.  the los banos newspaper has a write up about other people who had seen the ufo's.  i believe it was either 1971 or 1972.  i really need to talk to someone about what happened to me after this incident. it is a story like no other i have ever heard.
content.summary: I came out of my house to cross the street to see a friend when it just appeared over me and stayed awhile while it lit up everything around me

content.detailedDescription: The date was 12/18/2015. i was leaving a nursing home, stopped at a red light and noticed there were several planes in the area. about 5 of them, in the exact center of the planes was a blurred out floating grey/metallic disk. i pulled out my phone to take a video, by this time it's was slightly moving,it moved down a little basically moving in a straight line. it then seemed to phase out of our universe for a brief time, reappering in a different spot then phaseing out, never to be seen again. i do have some video, but it's not that great it's after the ufo phased out of sight for good it seems. i can include it if you want, you guys might have better luck with it then me.It does show all of the planes flying around in that area
content.summary: Grey ufo, with red lights on the bottom. stationary at first then started moving once i pulled out camera.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my way to pick my girlfriend up from work teusday the 29th of december 2015 6:00pm. as i approached her work i was stopped due to an amtrack train passing by, but as i approached the crossing (1 block away) i noticed an object moving very quickly with a rapidly flashing light that caught my attention. my first thought was maybe it was a drone, but as i got closer and came to a stop i could see that it was rather large(4ft or so) and much too fast and erratic in its flight to be any drone easily available for public. then as the train started to pass another object, similar in flight characteristics but different in design (this one had appendges). they seemed to interact almost playfully hovering and almost touching while the train passed, during this time i got several pictures. as the train was gone (a few min.) they each shot off in different directions rather quickly and abruptly. a block away i pulled in to the lot where i waited for my girlfriend i noticed one of the objects hovering about 100+ft in the air near me with a solid light . the past month have made me a serious believer in ufo phenomena as there has beein increasing intensity of sightings so i wasnt totally freaked out but this was the closest i have gotten and documented.Later that night i got up to use the bathroom and noticed a large very bright apparition through my window about 75ft in the air, it hovered for around 5 minutes and slowly moved out of sight in a linear path. i took photos of this as well.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 2 hovering and interacting over train crossing
